div.class: inner col col8 first last idd46378ca-ad4e-4f50-bc3c-a18768440127

div.p: With a presumptive positive case of COVID 19 present in Caddo Parish, Parish and City officials urge citizens to stay up to date with the most current information by visiting one of the following websites:

Current information from the CDC may be accessed here:
https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html
Current information from the Louisiana Department of Health may be accessed here: http://ldh.la.gov/index.cfm/page/3835

The State has provided a phone number that members of the public can call with any question about the virus: 1-855-523-2652. This line is available from 8:00am-4:30pm Central Time Monday through Friday. Also, http://emergency.louisiana.gov has updated guidance on COVID-19 in Louisiana.

Parish administration and members of the Caddo Parish Commission are staying in close contact with state and local agencies to monitor the developing situation in our Parish. At this time, all Parish facilities remain open to serve Caddo Parish citizens. As we continue to receive information on COVID-19 in the area, we will provide updates on any closures or cancellations of Parish sponsored events.

a.data-email-subject: Check out this news article for Caddo Parish, LA
